# Partial Protege (Trait)
## Overview
**Partial Protege:** You are adept at disguising your true talents. You gain a +1 trait bonus on [[Bluff (Skill)|Bluff]] checks and on [[Use Magic Device (Skill)|Use Magic Device]] checks made to emulate a class feature.

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 58
